mapper.sql: select w.id as id, w.operation_time as operationTime,w.status as status,w.pay_status as payStatus, w.balance_type_with_zb as balanceTypeWithZb,w.shipper_customer_name as shipperCustomerName, w.receive_name as receiveName,w.receive_link_name as receiveLinkName,w.receive_address as receiveAddress, w.receive_province_name as receiveProvinceName,w.receive_city_name as receiveCityName,w.receive_country_name as receiveCountryName, g.good_name as goodName,g.num as num,g.offer_weight as offerWeight,g.offer_volume as offerVolume, f.xfyf_fee_with_zb as xfyfFeeWithZb,w.alloc_center_id as allocCenterId,w.system_sn as systemSn,w.lsp_id as lspId from sb_waybill w left join sb_waybill_good g on w.id=g.waybill_id left join sb_waybill_fee f on w.id=f.waybill_id

w.id AS id, w.system_sn AS systemSn, w.sn AS sn, w.operation_time AS operationTime, w.status AS status, w.create_time AS createTime,
w.shipper_customer_name AS shipperCustomerName, w.shipper_province_id AS shipperProvinceId, w.shipper_province_name AS shipperProvinceName, w.shipper_city_id AS shipperCityId, w.shipper_city_name AS shipperCityName, w.shipper_country_id AS shipperCountryId, w.shipper_country_name AS shipperCountryName, w.shipper_town_id AS shipperTownId, w.shipper_town_name AS shipperTownName, w.shipper_address AS shipperAddress, w.shipper_link_name AS shipperLinkName, w.shipper_link_phone AS shipperLinkPhone,
w.receive_name AS receiveName, w.receive_province_id AS receiveProvinceId, w.receive_province_name AS receiveProvinceName, w.receive_city_id AS receiveCityId, w.receive_city_name AS receiveCityName, w.receive_country_id AS receiveCountryId, w.receive_country_name AS receiveCountryName, w.receive_address AS receiveAddress, w.receive_link_name AS receiveLinkName, w.receive_link_phone AS receiveLinkPhone,
g.good_name AS goodName,g.num AS num, g.pack AS pack, g.offer_weight AS offerWeight,g.offer_volume AS offerVolume
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sb_waybill w LEFT JOIN sb_waybill_good g ON w.id=g.waybill_id LEFT JOIN sb_waybill_fee_balance_with_benchmark f ON w.id = f.waybill_id
AND w.lsp_id = #{condition.lspId}
AND w.status = #{condition.waybillStatus}
AND f.status = 0 AND f.zb_receive_all_fee >= 0
AND f.status = 1 AND f.zb_receive_all_fee >= 0
AND f.status = 0 AND f.zb_receive_all_fee < 0
AND f.status = 1 AND f.zb_receive_all_fee < 0
AND f.status = 2
AND f.status = 3
AND w.operation_time >= #{condition.operationTimeBegin}
AND w.operation_time <= #{condition.operationTimeEnd}
AND ( w.system_sn like concat('%',trim(#{condition.searchString}),'%') OR w.sn like concat('%',trim(#{condition.searchString}),'%') OR g.good_name like concat('%',trim(#{condition.searchString}),'%')
OR w.shipper_customer_name like concat('%',trim(#{condition.searchString}),'%') OR w.shipper_link_name like concat('%',trim(#{condition.searchString}),'%') OR w.shipper_link_phone like concat('%',trim(#{condition.searchString}),'%')
OR w.receive_name like concat('%',trim(#{condition.searchString}),'%') OR w.receive_link_name like concat('%',trim(#{condition.searchString}),'%') OR w.receive_link_phone like concat('%',trim(#{condition.searchString}),'%')
OR concat(w.receive_province_name,w.receive_city_name,w.receive_country_name,w.receive_address) like concat('%',trim(#{condition.searchString}),'%') )
GROUP BY w.id ORDER BY operation_time DESC
